labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Search text will go up on first input, as if you went on a new line, App will crash on second input
data.expected_result: first input should be printed as single character, second input should be printed without crashing the app
data.short_description: App crashes when input is an empty dead key (press dead key once then enter) followed by two dead key in the search tool
data.steps_to_repro: - Find keys that requires to get pressed twice such ^, ¨ and '`'- Go to search and spam it, till there is a lot of multi lines.- (check the gif if you wish) https://i.imgur.com/EsX3lZ0.gifv
